website_summaries.verdict: The perfect size for storage needs on a balcony or small deck.
pros: Resin is very attractive, and the box provides seating for one person
The 22-gallon capacity is just enough for small garden tools, backyard toys, or a few chair cushions
cons: A few owners complain of difficulty assembling the box

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA is not a guarantee for quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. The hinges are plastic and one of the hinge axles on the back wall was already broken off and rattling around in the shipping box, along with plastic manufacturing debris. The hinge eyelets on the lid were warped, as were other parts of the lid. Update: I was able to return the damaged item without much trouble and re-ordered the same box via a local hardware store, so I could check for damage on receipt. The replacement had none of the issues I mentioned above. Updating to 4 stars. Would be 5 if Suncast took quality control seriously.
customer_reviews.author: NoxiousBanana

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Product came broken. The hinges were cracked and deformed. It's a hassle to replace/return. 2 day shipping rip off. Product rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Got a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. It took me 5 minutes to assemble one, because I had to read the instructions. It took me 2 minutes to assemble the second one. The parts are labeled well and the best part is that this product is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Small Deck Box
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and it feels strong and sturdy. I use it in my porch for my son to leave his work shoes in so he doesn’t bring the grease and metals inside the house. The water doesn’t get in and can sit on it when I want to sit on the porch. Is decorative and blends with the house.
customer_reviews.author: TooTall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Beautiful. Nice storage size.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one so much, I bought 2 more and plan on ordering again!. I used them to organize the items for my fire pit, sand, wood and kindling. As a plus they serve as extra seating and definitely remain sturdy with an adult weighing 180 lbs. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DPelton

customer_reviews.title: Great box that is doubling as a cat litter box enclosure outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: We have an screen enclosed pool area. We have 3 kitties who hang out in this area during the day. So we purchased this deck box for it's waterproof quality. We cut a square in the side and installed a kitty door so the opening would be blocked from any rain. It is working great as their litter box (which is inside of course and protected from the elements)!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good value, excellent waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Dry, stable, does as intended (a place for amazon to put packages out of weather and out of sight).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Adequate to the task
customer_reviews.text: Better than the prior version but it wouldn't cost any more to make the snap in spade clips holding the bottom in place more secure. They snap in just fine. They pop right back out with the gentlest of pressure from below. Better made, however, than the Amazon Basics copycat version. Better plastic and better floor.
customer_reviews.author: Nephromancer

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: My container/seat arrived with FIVE damaged areas. FIVE. The plastic was bent, broken and warped. Putting it together wasn't difficult, but the cheap plastic, with the damage, with having to put it together yourself means it's not worth the money. Go buy a container at a store where you can see a container/seat and be sure of the quality. I wonder if this will hold an adult of average weight.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Outdoor Storage
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a third Suncast 22-gallon storage box for my porch. I've had two on my deck for years which have held up well and keep things dry. On the deck I have one with gardening supplies (small bag of potting soil, garden tools, gloves, scissors to cut herbs, etc.) and in the other I have miscellaneous items I need when I'm outside entertaining (extension cord, insect repellent, paper towels, citronella candles, etc.) which is also what I'll use the porch box for. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3Acres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiding packages and small deliveries.
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully for our Amazon, UPS and USPS packages left at the door. It sits on the front porch so weather proofing I am unable to report on. I wouldn’t suggest one place a heavy pot or to sit on it, it works very well for my porch pick up items though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I was a little skeptical, but to be honest when all was said and done (assembly took under 5 mins w no tools) I love it. It is surprisingly sturdy and has a TON of room inside. I am about 180lbs and I can sit on it no problem/bend. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Handy little storage unit
customer_reviews.text: The storage unit definitely is small, but it was so easy to assemble (no tools needed) and is lightweight. It was just right to put a few frequently used items on my porch. Too small for deck cushions, I think, but handy for things you don’t want just sitting visible on the deck. Great price for what it is. I just bought it, so I can’t speak for durability or how it stands up to weather conditions, but I’m pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and very sturdy. I had already bought one for my garden tools and wanted another to put in the front for ice melter. Looks sharp and holds four containers.
customer_reviews.author: (Oliver906)

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: The box was a really nice size and easy to assemble. The only dislike I had was I ordered one and received on April 8 and was $39.00 and then decided to get a second one on April 8 and that one was $49.99. Couldn't understand why the price went up that quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stitcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spa seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution to keep all our spachemicals out of sight, and add some much needed seating near the spa. We love it and couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aline Stelzner

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor storage bin
customer_reviews.text: We use this bin to store our grilling supplies on our back patio. The bin was easy assemble and looks great. It's rained a few times since we've gotten the bin and everything inside stays dry.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great. Held a lot more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the carton... where's the hardware? Not needed! Just pop it together. Yes, but can it it be strong enough to sit on? Very much so. I have an apartment deck it's wonderful for stuff I don't want in a closet (potting soil, gardening tools etc). Beside seating makes a perfect side table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage is always good
customer_reviews.text: it's a little lighter weights and I was expecting it to be. But I haven't really had a chance to see how it's going to stand up. After a few months of use maybe I'll change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Carin Martin

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy and well made box
customer_reviews.text: This box seems very well made. Waterproof, even during strong rains. I use it to store an emergency escape ladder and exercise equipment on my balcony. It also doubles as a comfortable seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The product and it’s packaging came damaged... the product itself is warped in spots. It says it doubles as a seat but I wouldn’t let someone sit on it. Doesn’t seem sturdy at all. For $60.00 the quality should be way better. I expect something of this material and quality to be about half the price. Very disappointed. Didn’t feel like returning due to COVID and delays. Was hoping to maybe get a discount on item since damaged but can’t get ahold of anyone since they’re experiencing “delays.” Do yourself a favor, don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put it at my front door for deliveries from the post office etc, I had to put a couple of bricks in it because when it is empty the wind easily blows it away but it has served by purpose beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Jan D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my small front porch. Sturdy. Stays dry on the inside during the rainy days. So easy to assemble, even a kindergartner could put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small storage cube for my small deck. Arrived within 24 hours, a snap to put together..literally, you snap it together. Looks good, durable and all clutter (bags of soil and unused pots are now out of sight). Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: marti

customer_reviews.title: Great outside storage!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of outside storage container for kid toys! Spiders can't get in! My son (3 years old) can sit on it so I can put his shoes on before he runs off to play!
customer_reviews.author: tyler priest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized storage/ extra “seat” for cookouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to store his variety of bags of smoker pellets. Very roomy and fits perfectly next to his smoker/grill. It is also used as an extra seat if needed!
customer_reviews.author: signa morgan

customer_reviews.title: No screws, hammers or screwdrivers needed!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together....no screws or hammers needed! It's really nice for storing stuff on my porch, plus it provides additional seating.
customer_reviews.author: Pattyann

customer_reviews.title: Great storage box
customer_reviews.text: This storage box is very easy to put together - took about 5 minutes, no tools. It seems sturdy and a good size. Especially for the price, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: The RioB Family

customer_reviews.title: Good out door box
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one as I have one that I store my charge cable in, for my car, This one I use to store my hot tub chemicles and stuff in
customer_reviews.author: B bruce

customer_reviews.title: For the boater
customer_reviews.text: We used three of these paired with the outs bench as storage and seats on our pontoon. Anchored them down to the boat. It was an excellent idea!
customer_reviews.author: DeeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these boxes to keep garden supplies in and they work great, strong enough for a full grown man to sit on and they do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Literally took 2 minutes to put together... just snaps together. No tools or hardware Using on deck for boots... fits my size 12 tall rain boots and a pair of size 13 cowboy boots with a ton of room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy no tool assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a great product! Easy to assemble ( all pieces are marked with side, top,bottom etc) big enough yo store patio chair covers. Can even use as a side table.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: It's a cheap plastic box
customer_reviews.text: After you put it together, you wonder why it didn't cost five bucks. It looks fine, and keeps my gardening tools dry though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and color, but haven’t been able to find a larger one that’s the same brand and color.
customer_reviews.author: E. F. N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor storage
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s perfect for outdoor storage for toys and also goes wonderfully with the aesthetic of our yard. It seems very sturdy thus far and has done well with rain. It was also easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Storage bin
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bin for the deck. We use it for the deck furniture covers. But wanted to let you know it looks bigger in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in under a minute, I use to house all my kids soccer, football, and basketballs.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little storage container
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, no tools, took 5 minutes. Looks nice and the perfect size for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for needs
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to keep on the porch to house furniture covers when not is use. I purchased the stone gray storage container which blends in with the porch color. I have a potted plant on top in the corner of the porch and the container looks sleek. It just blends in and looks very nice. It was easy to put together and seems very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very sturdy. Using this outside on our porch and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi of 9

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and is perfect for storing throw pillows, blankets, and toys. And it feels very sturdy for sitting too. I will be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great service
customer_reviews.text: I have used there products for years and have found them to be well made easy to assemble and very long lasting even when left out in the northern new youk winters I just order a deck box that was damaged in shipping did not affect it working as needed not right contacted seller they corrected the problem quickly a great product and long lasting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This box is perfect for what I needed, which was a place to put a bunch of grill accessories. It was very easy to put together, sturdy, and provides an extra seat next to our outdoor grill. You could store some small pillows or deck lights or other misc deck things to keep them out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Marnee B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Deck Box
customer_reviews.text: Nice little deck box for the money. Very easy to assemble, took me 5 minutes. I needed something to hold my robotic pool cleaner and power box. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and one of them did not look like the picture. Very disappointed. Further, the price dropped by almost $20 after I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: missmoe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Large enough and relatively light weight ; easy to move around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it cute 4 the space and storage i needed
customer_reviews.text: it is a space saver...it is easy to assemble. it came in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: QUEEN

customer_reviews.title: Problematic with shipping items
customer_reviews.text: First of all the product looks and feels fine, the problem falls on their distribution portion of their company because I am missing the front panel and instead was shipped two back panels. I'll be waiting to see how quickly they respond to this hiccup and will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: david hernandez

customer_reviews.title: nice storage
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and is the perfect size to store towels by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: DJG

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight Deck Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller light weight deck box. It is a good value for the cost. I purchased this to have packages dropped off in, to protect from the weather until they were picked up. It suits my purpose. I did put a heavy rock on top of the lid to prevent it from blowing off or opening during strong winds. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tboucherwy

customer_reviews.title: Nice , easy to assemble, small storage unit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep my pool chemicals in, works fine for this use.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in minutes with no tools, sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Van Zant

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice storage box, just the right size for the hot tub supplies.

customer_reviews.title: Great box,
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price on this, fast shipping and super easy to assemble. Holds plenty and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Bamagirl227

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: 4 min.to put together ,seems sturdy can sit on lid, can leave outside .
customer_reviews.author: kathleen Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing outdoor items. It also works as a seat! It has been out during bad storms and no water gets in. Loved this product!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carolina Flecher

customer_reviews.title: Using the storage box for garden hoses
customer_reviews.text: Drilled drain holes in the bottom of the storage box and a larger hole in the lower side for the hose going to the spigot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snapped togather!
customer_reviews.text: It was Fantastic It Snapped to gather. Done in 5 minute Very sturdy. Great product.😛
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fought

customer_reviews.title: No hardware. Snap together assembly.
customer_reviews.text: No hardware involved just a snap together piece. Fortunately I bought it only for cushion storage as I would not trust someone to sit on it. Not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Yachera

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Works as a seat and storage. Works great on small patio.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This is what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. It has held up to 350 pounds without any issues. The contents stay dry and it's a good price point. I liked it so much, I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my uses. No tools needed. Just snaps together in seconds. Sturdy and perfect for storing patio furniture covers without having to another big piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to put together and hold all my kids outside toys! Make for a clutter free porch I love them!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it to store hot tub supplies. Can sit on it, no leakage so far. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Attractive box for deck
customer_reviews.text: Nice deck box. Not sure yet how weatherproof it is as it hasn’t rained since I put it on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Handsome and inexpensive. Easy to assemble. Buying a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lafone

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my back patio for random ball storage and an extra seat.

customer_reviews.title: Great for package delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice-looking storage container that I set next to my front door for packages delivered by Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and 100% practical
customer_reviews.text: Easy win! Keeps my front porch looking clutter free from rain books and puppy supplies

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came in damaged and dented. Not happy with the quality.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but the hinge on the lid was broken right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Fieweger

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cat food & a very good looking seat.

customer_reviews.title: The color is graysh not brownish.
customer_reviews.text: I had no chance to see yet how good is the waterproof.

customer_reviews.title: Made in The USA
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. I love the gray color. Took me <5 min. to put together. No tools. Just gave the pieces a good hit with my fist. Nice and sturdy. Easy to open and close. I will be buying more. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Completely dry inside, even after major raining.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to store outdoor boots. Looks nice by the back door.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor furniture covers
customer_reviews.text: This deck box is perfect for storing outdoor furniture covers. To small for cushions but just the right size for outdoor accessories. It took around five minutes to put together. The finished product is sturdy and handles sun and weather nicely.
customer_reviews.author: woody

product_meta.title: Suncast 22-Gallon Small Deck Box - Lightweight Resin Indoor/Outdoor Storage Container and Seat for Patio Cushions and Gardening Tools - Store Items on Patio, Garage, Yard - Stone Gray
product_meta.description: The Suncast plastic storage container is an attractive and highly versatile solution for use throughout your home and yard. The chest design and hinged lid allow for easy access to your tools and accessories. With a holding capacity of 22 gallons (17" x 22" x 20.5"), the deck box is compact and space-efficient, easily tucked away in your laundry room or garage. Use it on your deck to stow away patio cushions, gardening tools and grill accessories, or in your house to store boots, gloves, hats, and more. The weatherproof body will resist fading, while the rain water flows off of the box without pooling to keep your belongings dry and mildew-free. Constructed with durable and waterproof resin that is built to last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: DECK STORAGE BOX: Beautiful plastic outdoor box has a 22-gallon capacity for patio, deck, yard, porch, garage, and shed storage!
DURABLE: Water-resistant poly resin construction resists fading and rust to keep your box looking new for years to come
VERSATILE: For use indoors or outdoors to store pool toys, grill supplies, patio cushions, gardening tools, sports equipment, yard gloves, and more!
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Lid flips open on hinges for easy access to your items. Rain water flows off of the box to keep your belongings dry and free from mildew and rust
SMALL SIZED: Storage box measures 17" x 22" x 20.5", the perfect size and fit for any living space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars480 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
